***New for 2024:** No updates*

**1966:** The Castiles play a gig at the Hullaballoo in Middletown, New Jersey.

![](https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/hulla.jpg)

**1967:** The Castiles open for The Broadways at the Ocean Side Surf Club in Sea Bright, New Jersey.

![](https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/1967-1222.jpg)

**1971:** Bruce is in California visiting his parents, with no set return date. It appears that he anticipates staying a while, though, because he takes the time to obtain his California driver’s license.

![](https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/cadriverlice-300x212.jpg)

**1973:** Bruce and his band headline at Uncle Al’s Erlton Theater Lounge in Cherry Hill, New Jersey.

![](https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/1973-1222-242x300.jpeg)

**1977:** Bruce calls into WHFS-FM in Bethesda to record a Christmas message for his fans and the station’s listeners.

[https://videopress.com/embed/WyvLEBBw](https://videopress.com/embed/WyvLEBBw)

**1984:** As “[Born in the U.S.A.](https://estreetshuffle.com/index.php/2019/09/21/roll-of-the-dice-born-in-the-u-s-a/)” moves up the charts, *American Top 40* host Casey Kasem lauds Bruce’s work ethic.

[https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/AT40-1984-12-22.mp3?_=6](https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/AT40-1984-12-22.mp3?_=6)

<https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/12/AT40-1984-12-22.mp3>

**2002:** Bruce holds a private holiday party and performance at The Stone Pony in Asbury Park.

**2008:** Bruce makes a surprise appearance at Bobby Bandiera’s Hope Concert at the Count Basie Theater in Red Bank, performing a few numbers with Jon Bon Jovi, Southside Johnny, Gary U.S. Bonds, and others.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EaxAA4kG5r8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EaxAA4kG5r8)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9ePvMQA20E](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9ePvMQA20E)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v7ZOK7H8VGQ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v7ZOK7H8VGQ)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2CpxeMLfWec](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2CpxeMLfWec)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=db6AIdJ1nM0](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=db6AIdJ1nM0)

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W4VjcseoJlo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W4VjcseoJlo)

![](https://estreetshuffle.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/2008-12-22.png)

**2017:** *Springsteen on Broadway* continues its theatrical run at the Walter Kerr Theater in New York City.
